summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Darren Indyke to have signing authority and verbal confirmation on all accounts related to a financial relationship with Deutsche Bank. The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby and includes contact information for verification.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the author of the letter, granting authority to Darren Indyke.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as the individual who is granted signing authority on accounts associated with the financial relationship.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the letter from Jeffrey Epstein regarding the authorization.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Darren Indyke to act on his behalf regarding financial matters.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The letter grants Darren Indyke signing authority on all accounts associated with the financial relationship with Deutsche Bank.
It is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
The letter includes a request for verbal confirmation and callback authority for Darren Indyke.
The document is marked as confidential.
